name: Alice - 90 seconds left (Pierre ARNAUDET)
description:
Alice - 90 seconds left is a puzzle-adventure game where you're trapped on an island with a friend, Alice,  forced in a guillotine and you have 90 seconds to figure out how to save her before time rewinds to the beginning.

It's a project made to confirm our second-year of bachelor in a month and a half with a team of 4 students. My main role was Game Designer, so I worked on the puzzle design, the narration, the 2D elements, the UI, the sound design,  the level design, the music and a bit of integration.

Other Team Members : 

Pierre Arnaudet : Programmer

Mégane Reynes : 3D Artist

Hugo Loison : 3D Artist
